DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the effect of an experimental toothpaste on maintaining gingival health over a 24 week period measured through modified gingival index, bleeding, plaque, and plaque bacteria. Prior to commencing study treatment, subjects will undergo a dental prophylaxis followed by a 2 week period of oral hygiene instruction and weekly professional tooth cleaning to bring the subjects to their optimum gingival health prior to commencing study treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Efficacy of an Experimental Toothpaste
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects aged 18 years and older A minimum of 20 permanent gradable teeth For baseline eligibility, subjects must have a minimum Modified Gingival Index score of 1.52.3.
